issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. issue.title: m.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

n/a

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome, Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=jNQXAC9IVRw

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. in the "AdGuard – Social Media" filter list, there is a filter that specifically blocks the youtube share button on mobile: 

`m.youtube.com##ytm-button-renderer.icon-share_arrow`

the share button is actually functional and should not be blocked

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1: filter list disabled - share button visible</summary>

![share-1](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/15662785/700505dd-d525-42a8-8d67-85f6dc76b771)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2: filter list enabled - share button hidden</summary>

![share-2](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/15662785/0994a0f1-aa49-4a01-af5c-80b334b9d9f6)

</details>

3. request: please remove this filter

the list is intended for social media annoyances. this is not a share button on a third party website like social media buttons

it does not make sense to block a button that is actually functional on the first party website itself

especially since it is *not* blocked on the desktop site, where it is arguably less useful.

the share button actually delivers useful functionality for copying short links to the video. this is particularly useful on mobile because copying the address bar will copy the URL to the mobile site

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. ### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://rt.pornhub.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frt.pornhub.com%2F) ### Comment > некорректно отображается сайт https://rt.pornhub.com/ при включенном AdGuard. Проблема из-за фильтра AdGuard Popups filter (Optimized) https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/19_optimized.txt Если его выключить, покажет запрос на проверку возраста через ВК, если включить, то коряво отображает сайт. This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Not reproduced it with AdGuard filters on my end.
Try to leave only AdGuard filters, clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
I left the rule in that you suggested, and also blocked an ad on the page. I checked 'Advanced Settings' and 'Block Similar'. That seems to have worked across the DM site. If it's relevant / useful, the rule that has been added to User Rules : `[dailymail.co.uk##.dmg-ads, .dmg-ads-mpu-top, .dmg-ads-justify-center]`

I'm happy for this to be closed, I appreciate the help!

Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Cannot reproduce ads or a popup.
Please test in user filter:
```
deezer.com#%#//scriptlet('json-prune', 'results.*.RIGHTS.STREAM_ADS')
deezer.com#%#//scriptlet('json-prune', 'results.*.RIGHTS.STREAM_ADS_AVAILABLE')
```

@AdguardTeam/filters-maintainers please take a look.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails.
